page.title: 11Leisure
page.content: {The Playing Field The playing field was opened in 1982 by Mr.J.Millward who was Headmaster of Willoughby School until 1981.Apparatus was provided from funds raised by locals and the land was lent for as long as was necessary by J.Roughton. The school has the use of it as well as the general public and in return the County Council Playingfields Com- mittee maintain the grounds. {Youth Club One of the complaints of young people in the villages is that there is nothing to do;but there is a Youth Club which is held in the village hall on Monday nights in the winter.It is run by the Rev.A.Taylor and is for 10-16 year old youths.The facilities are not very good e.g. the snooker table cloth is torn and there is one table-tennis table.Entry costs 20p.
